result.title: SDE
result.description:
Mainly focus on software development within Azure environment including solution and data pipeline.

Main Responsibilities

Develop analytics tools or services in Azure environment to provide actionable insights into business data with Python or C#.
Work with data and analytics experts to provide functionality or solution in our data systems.
Develop and manage Data Pipeline for extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources.
Qualifications

1+ year Python or C# working experience
Working experience with relational databases or data warehouse.
Experience with Big data technology such as PySpark, Databricks, USQL is helpful.
Knowledge with Big data ETL pipeline
Strong project management and organizational skills.
